# Baseball Salary Analysis

Teaching scaffold for STAT 386 final projects. The repository bundles a Python package, Quarto site, automated tests, and a customizable Streamlit prototype.

We explore the relationship between MLB performance and salaries from 2018-2025. We developed a python package that follows our webscraping, EDA, and multiple linear regression. Our tutorial, documentation, and report are a quarto github pages website, with additonal interactive app via Streamlit.

- **GitHub Repo:** https://github.com/cottonjenn/baseball_project/tree/master
- **Project Website:** https://cottonjenn.github.io/baseball_project/
